column1: Suzzara (Lower Mantovano: Süsèra) is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Mantua in the Italian region of Lombardy
column2: located about 130 kilometres (81 mi) southeast of Milan and about 20 kilometres (12 mi) south of the city of Mantua.

column1: Suzzara was given the honorary title of a city by a royal decree dated November 9
column2: 1923. It is home to a large IVECO/CNH plant

column1: It includes six civil parishes (frazioni): Brusatasso
